title: Not all apps from the Play Store are copying to my new phone. Is this normal?
content: I've tried to copy data from an older Android phone to my new Pixel 4a. Only a fraction of the apps copy over, and I downloaded all of them from the Play store. I am using a cable to transfer and only the apps that are published by Google are copying over. Others such as Instagram, NYT news, etc are left behind. This seems like a lot of work to manually retrieve all these apps again. Is this expected?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
